Articles.Content:
So I saw this on the steam forum and naturally came here to fin out more.

[http://steamcommunity.com/app/220200/discussions/0/618458030655228908/](http://steamcommunity.com/app/220200/discussions/0/618458030655228908/)

[https://twitter.com/ZedsTed/status/583745578913390592](https://twitter.com/ZedsTed/status/583745578913390592)

------

""Wrapping up the QA phase on [@KerbalSpaceP](https://twitter.com/KerbalSpaceP) 1.0. Now to get ready to start Experimentals!""

----

I didn't any other posts on it so I figured I would start one in case anyone missed it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Ummmm...no offense but there is already a [22 page long Hypetrain thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114646-Unofficial-Official-1-0-Hype-Thread%21) going on right now.
Yea once the hype threads get so long I kinda quit reading them. Why would I take offense to your comment? Also this isn't hype, this is confirmed.

There is an official announcement [here.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114641-Kerbal-Space-Program-version-1-0-is-entering-Experimental-staging?p=1818247#post1818247) [And here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114645-Kerbal-Space-Program-1-0-Enters-Experimental-Testing).

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-04T17:17:37Z" title="04/04/2015 05:17  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 4, 2015</time> by Robotengineer**
Yay! I can't wait to see if they're making planetary resources. That'd be so cool.

> 
> Yay! I can't wait to see if they're making planetary resources. That'd be so cool.

They are, in fact they hired Karbonite's developer in order to help make them!

In the interest of keeping the conversation about the Experimentals in one place, please take it over to the [Experimentals Announcement thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114645-Kerbal-Space-Program-1-0-Enters-Experimental-Testing).
